QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Nagrand!
QuestData.Description: The Warchief has asked for any able bodied champions of the Horde to ride to the aid of Garadar.$B$BThe home of the Mag'har, lies to the south, in Nagrand. Take the southern road out of the marsh, then turn east at the first fork and look for a large settlement on the lake.$B$BReport to Captain Kroghan there and offer him what assistance you can. Garadar must not fall!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Captain Kroghan at Garadar in Nagrand.
